title: Definitions
context: B. Definitions §88-261 Definitions. (a) The following words and phrases as used in this part shall have the same meanings as defined in section 88-21, unless a different meaning is plainly required by the context: &ldquo;accumulated contributions&rdquo;; &ldquo;actuarial equivalent&rdquo;; &ldquo;average final compensation&rdquo;; &ldquo;beneficiary&rdquo;; &ldquo;board&rdquo;; &ldquo;county&rdquo;; &ldquo;employee&rdquo;; &ldquo;medical board&rdquo;; &ldquo;retirant&rdquo;; &ldquo;retirement allowance&rdquo;; &ldquo;service&rdquo;; and &ldquo;system&rdquo;. (b) The following words and phrases as used in this part shall have the following meanings, unless a different meaning is plainly required by the context: &ldquo;Member&rdquo;: a class C member as described in section 88-47. [L 1984, c 108, pt of §8; am L 1997, c 212, §5; am L 2005, c 58, §18; am L 2006, c 169, §41]
